EmailTemplate.name: 2018BK_O_10 Promotion for the AeroWave 100 Satellite Internet System EXTERNAL.20
EmailTemplate.subject: 2018 BendixKing Bulletin Updates
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
Sales Bulletin | March 30, 2018
BendixKing would like to present the following 2018 Sales Bulletin. The complete list of 2018 Sales Bulletins is available at MyAerospace/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/parts-and-repairs/downloads/sales-bulletins#sort=%40fdisplayname2077%20descending]]>. Dealers must log-in to view these bulletins.
Operator Sales Bulletin:
Bulletin Operator number 2018BK_O_10 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2018BK_O_10 Promotion for the AeroWave 100 Satellite Internet System.pdf]]> Promotion for the AeroWave 100 Satellite Internet System. BendixKing is pleased to offer an end user rebate promotion for the AeroWave 100 system.
Find your nearest BendixKing Area Sales Manager by visiting our website: http://www.bendixking.com/Company/Sales-Team <[[http://www.bendixking.com/Company/Sales-Team]]>
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
